data.message:
Can we PLEASE have the option to hide comments and likes from friends back?? 
There are so many competitions that they enter that it fills up news feeds with spam!
I'd rather not hide my friends' post all together as I'd still like to see their own posts - not what they comment on or like. 
PLEASE!!!!

replies.message: Exactly. I can see what they liked & commented on when it's got nothing to do w/me. It's like  notifications  as far as I'm concerned.
